div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem xj die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day the borghe' fundin one thome buchane be the procuratoris
of george meldrum fear' of fyve was continevit to the cumin of the
saide george to the tone becaus' thome Johne low allegit and tuk
to preiwe that the saide fische sulde Remane in the handis of the saide
thomas vnto the tyme It war' determit quethir he hede rycht to the
saide fische or nocht

The saide day Williame Scrogis oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to pay ane barrele of Salmonde Sufficient merchande
gude of the Richtuis' bynde of abirdene at the fest of Sanct
Jonhne baptist callit mydsommer' next to Cum to gilbert menyeis
for redy money pait

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit Alexander King to Rede
his pot fra mastir James Srathachin and pay him the sex s'
of annuell Ande get' ane Officiar' arrest the almary of
Dauid marris being within his hous' and halde it quhile he
be pait of the saide Sex s' becaus' the saide Dauy aw
to freithe the said pot to the saide Alexander

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xiij die mensis octobris anno quo Supra

add.foreign: Joneta Rede et Sponsa patricij chernsid'

div.p:
The saide day Elizibeth' Waus denyit that scho awe ony
thingis to Jonet rede or that scho has ony hous' in tak
of hir' ande Offerit hir' Redy tile vndirlie the deliuirance
of ane assis' in ony thingis that the saide Jonet hed to
say tile hir'

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday
the xvj day of this Instant monetht of October' to Jonet
Rede the Relict of vmquhile Robert prat to preiwe quhat
thingis that Elizibeth Waus Is aving tile hir'

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assgnit monun
day the pennult day of this Instant monetht of Octobir
to Anny Cullane and Katherine douchtiris and ayris tile vmquhile
mathou Cullan tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one
thame be sere Jonhne ruthirfurde knicht for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of the Some of ane hundretht merkis
for the Inquietacioun' and trubuling of him in Ane lande
liand' on the gastraw as the saide borghe mar' fullely
proportis Ande thai discernis the Copy of the saide borghe'
to the saidez Anne and Katherine

Johannes leslie de Warderis Johannes ruthirfurde miles Dauid menyes Johannes cullane Alexander
Rede Jacobus Colisone Andreas Cullane Johannes Knollis Duncanus Colisone Willelmus Wormet
thomas fyf Johannes annand' Dauid fynne Johannes falconar et Andreas steuinson'
burgensis dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam dauid spens patricius Johannis
Spens latoris presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de dimidietate vnius terre cum pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastraw
ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam thome mar' ex australi ex vna terram
quondam magistri alexandri Waus ex boreali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam
versus oriens et torrentem sine aqueductum molendinorum versus occidens
Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimis et propinquior heres dicti quondam Dauid patricij
suj de dicta dimidietate terre cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittimis etatiis Et quod dicta
dimidietas terre valet nunc per annum decim solidos et valuit quinque s' tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existet in manibus domini nostri Regis per spacium trium
annorum aut eocirca ob decessum dicti quondam Dauid In defectu virj heredis Jus suum
huiusque minime prosequentis

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit William Rollande and thome Ridale
to big thar' dikis Sufficientlie as efferis betuix tham and mastir Androw
Crafurde vndir the pane of xl s'

Eodeme die Comparuit Willelmus ranisone et presentauit cristinum Schand' in
Curia responsure pro asserto perturbio Sponsa thome Narne Ac fecit
Constituit creauit et nominauit magistrum georgium bisset suum legittimum procuratorem
ad Respondendum Agendum et defendendum In premisse Cum potestate substituendum et cetera
promittens de Rato et grato Ac constituit Johannem mar' suum procuratorem In primis
de Rato et grato promittenti

Eodem die Katherina Cullane et Agnes Cullan fecerunt con constitue
runt et ordinarunt Johannem mar' ballivium suum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem
Cum potestate substituendum dans et concedens eidem ac suis substitutis pluribus
aut vnj suam liberam potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se ad Respondendum plegio
super eas per Johannem ruthirfurde militem porrecto de et super summa Centum marcarum
vsualis monete scocie Agendum defendendum prosequendum promittens de Rato et
grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis et Oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abidene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvjo die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis continevit the actioun' debatabill
betuix Elizibeth' Iruyn one that ane part Ande William buchan
one that vthir part Anent the proping' of ane hous' quhile
friday that next Cumis for the waiknes of the court

The aide day Elizibetht Iruyn Solempnitlie protestit that the
continuacioun' of the actioun' debatabile betuix hir' and William
buchan to the next friday turne hir' nor' hir lande to nay
preiudice

The saide day Williame buchan disassensit to the continuacion
of the actioun' debatabile betuix him and Elizibeth' Iruyn Ande
offerit him redy tile vndirly the law furtht with in the
said' actioun' protestande the saide continiacion turne him to nay
preiudice

The saide day the balyeis causit ormonde leslie Officiar' to
call Jonet Rede the relict of vmquhile Robert prat to Comper' bringand'
with hir' the preuis and richtis that scho hed' to preiwe the xx s' clamyt aving
hir' be Elizibetht Waus eftir the tenor of the act maid' tharupon' obefor
at commavnde of our' Soueran lordis lettres quhilkis oft tymes callit and nocht
Comperit the saide Elizibeth personaly present Offerit hir redy tile ansuer
to the saide Jonet Anent the sade xxtj s' ande in ale thingis scho hede tile
oppone in contrar' hir Ande tile hir' hir' preuis lede et cetera protestande for his costis
and costis Ande that scho be nocht herde in Jugement quhill scho be nevlengis
warnit tharto

The saide day Wat Allansone grantit to pay to margaret hill four' schillingis
for ane Ring within ane monetht hereftir

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de abirdene Coram honorabilis viris Alexandri menyes preposito
Thomas leslie Johanne mar' et Johanne Colisone tribus balliuorum dicti burgj in pretorio
eiusdem protribunali sedentibus decimo sexto die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo
quingentesimo tercio per subscriptos videlicet Dauid menyeis Alexandrum chamer gilbertum
menyeis Jacobum Colisone Duncanum Colisone Richardum Waus Willelmum portar
Johannem moir' Alexandrum hay Willelmum murray Johannem grig Richardum Waus Juniorem
Johannem falconar et Andream stevinsone et henricum Rede burgensis dicti burgi Quj
Jurati dicunt quod quondam henricus Ruthirfurde frater auj Johnanis allyr
des de baddnisbrocht latoris / presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus vt /
de feodo ad pacem et fidem Domini nostri Regis de vno annuo Redditu
Octo solidorum vsualis monete scocie annuatim leuandum de quadam terra quondam Domini Alexandri
young rectoris de forbes Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram magistri Alexandri Cullane Rectoris de Oyn' ex australi
ex vna et terram heredum quondam Roberti Cullan ex boreali partibus ab altera Et
Communionem viam regiam versus occidens Et de vno annuo Redditu
quatuor solidorum de terra quondam thome Schethin Jacente ex orientali parte
Johannes andirson' dicti vici furcarum inter terram Johannis Cullane ex australi ex vna et
terram quondam Johannis vocat andirson' ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Johannes
allirdes est vnus de legittimus et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam henrici fratris auj
suj de dictis annuis redditibus cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod valor
eorundem patet Et quod tenentur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existum in manibus d domini nostri Regis per spacium sex annorum aut
eocirca per decessam quondam Jonete menyes sponsa dicti quondam henrici racione
conuicte Infeodacionis eosdem possiden' in defectu virj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis
datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti balliuj Ac sigillis quorunda quj huic
Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum Anno die et mense et loco prenotatis

Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam henricus ruthirfurde frater Auj Jonete
betsone latricis / presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de
feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de duobus anuis Red
ditibus in Inquisicione Immediate precedens et cetera Et quod dicta Joneta betsone est vna de legittimis
et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam henrici et cetera prout predictus Johannes allirdes et cetera

Eodem die Johannes murray fecit constituit creauit et Nominauit patricium
gordone de methtlik suum legittimum procuratorem Cum potestate substituendum ad respondendum plegio
super eum per Johnanem leslie de Warderis xl porrecto penes quandam
Cristianj summam trecentum marcarum continencium Agendum defendendum Respondendum
promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum certeris terminis
et clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to thome
Ridale to ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Dauy colp tutor to
Isabell buchan for the wranguis' Intrometting of ane covntour Occupeing'
of ane forbutht but tak or Assedacioun' of him and for the taxt maill
of the Samyn as in the said' borghe mar' fullie Is contenit

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxmo die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day thomas buchane grauntit him avande to
george meldrum fear of fyve four barrellis of Salmond'
and tua barellis of girls' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law Ande the saide george and Johne
meldrum Oblist and bande thame be the fathtis of thar
bodiis coniunctlie and Seueralie Renunciande ale benefite of diuisioun
to keip and warande the saide thomas fre and Skathtles
of the said' fische at the handis of Johne low

The saide day the borghe' fundin one Johne of murray be
Johne leslie of Warderis with consent of Johne mar' procurator
to the saide Johne leslie one that ane part Ande patry gordon'
procurator for the saide Johne of murray one that vthir part was
continevit to monunday that next Cumis but preiudice tile ony
partj Ande without ony preiudice of the process' lede tharupon'
Obefor

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday
that next Cumis to thome ridale tile ansuer to the borghe
fundin one him be Dauy colp for the wranguis' Intro
meting with ane covntour' pertening to the ayr of vmquhile
William Colp et cetera Ande for the wranguis' occupeing of
ane forbutht without tak et cetera and for the taxt maile et cetera

The saide day Elizibetht Steuart Warnit and chargit
Jonhne annande personalie to Remoiwe out of hir' hous'
at the next Witsonday' Ande taxt v s' et j d' Ilkan
oulk that he Sittis in the saide lande eftir Witsonday of
taxt maile

The saide day mathou branche Duncan Crak and James
Wricht be thar' aithis deliuerit the Wair'stall follouit be sere
Androw Colisone was wortht viij s' the tyme that the saide
Duncan Intromettit with It quhilkis the balyes chargit him
to pay to the saide sere Androw within terme of law

Eodem die Alexander nory amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Richardi
Waus prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Andree lousone Cuj emen
dabit ut Jura volunt Et Idem Andreas quitus de perturbio
dicti Alexandri

Eodem die Egidius gray amerciatur per dictam assisam ex ore
dicti Ricardi prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio thome Scot
Cultellum Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et Idem thomas quitus de
perturbio dicti egidij

The saide day Duncan Crak pait the saide viij s' to sere Androw
Colisone Ande the saide sere Androw fand' Jonhne Colisone his brothir
Sone borghe' and Souerte to kepe the said' Duncan skathles and fre of the said'
viij s' and wairsall for ale personis havand' entires' tharto be his hande landis
and gudis

The saide day Elizibetht Iruyn the relict of vmquhile allirdes of that
Ilk follouit and persevit Williame buchane baxtar for the wranguis' castin
done of hir' hous' pertening to hir' in coniunctfeftment liande in the Castalgate
one the southt part of the samyn gat betuix the lande of the saide Williamis
on' the est part Ande the lande of Alexander menyes aldirman one the west part quhilkis
wrang the said' William be him and patry Rede his forspekar denyit Ande
thareftir the saide complant in strintht of ane borghe' with Consent of the said partiis
was put to the decisioun' of thir personis eftir follouing that is to say Dauy menyes
Robert blinsele Alexander Rede gilbert menyeis Johne Knollis James Colisone Alexander mar'
Dauy mar' alexander gray thomas Waus Duncan Colisone Johne Stevinsone Jhone Andirson'
Johne auchneywe and Johne falconar burgis of the said burghe quhilkis the gret bodelie
aithe Suorne in ane Assis' the richtis resonis and allegacionis of batht the said
partiis witnes and preuys led herde sene and vndirstandin deliuirit and fande the saide
William buchan quyt of the wrangus' castin done of the saide hous' becaus It
was sufficientlie preuit befor the saide assis' an als be hir avne gravnt that
the saide William warnit hir' lauchfullie Obefor or he gert put ony werk
men to his hous' to Cum and se him put Werkmen to Resone his hous' and to se
he hid' hir' nay skathis Ande forthir becaus' It was preuit be diuers'
personis wekmen and vthiris that the saide William nor the labour' done
to his hous' dide nay skath to the saide hous' pertening to the saide elizi
betht sayand it walde haue fallin done It allane Suppos the saide William
had neuire put hande to his hous'

add.foreign: deposiciones testium productum in causa debatabili mota per Elizibetht Iruyn contra

div.p:
The saide day Jonhne mvnk deponit be his aitht that Williame
buchan hed' nay wyet of the done fallin of the hous' pertening tile
Elizibeth Iruyn Ande that the saide hous' walde haue fallin done it alan' supposs'
the saide William hed neuire put hande to his hous'
Nicholl masone concordis with the saide Johnez' deposicone in ale thingis be
his aithe
Androw balcrome be his aithe concordis with the saide Johnez deposicionez in ale
thinigs Ande says forthir deponit that the said' William Did' nay skath
to the said' hous'

The saide day the aldirman ballieis Counsale ande Communite
present for the tyme Consentit ande grantit to gif to mastir
James cumyne yerlie tene markis vsuale money of
Scotlande ay and quhile thai promove him tile ane half
nethis fischingis of the mydchingile or the furdis one
the wattir of Dee grissome fre he payande the male of the
saide fischingis as vthiris nychtbouris pais sua that the saide
mastir James wif barnis and houshalde halde hous' and mak
personale residence within the saide burghe Ande Cum and vesy tham
that beis seik and Schew thame his medicin one thar expens'
Ande nocht to pay the saide annual pension' of tene merkis nor
nayn' part of it vnto the tyme that his saide wif houshalde
and barnis Cum and makis personale residence within the said' burghe
ande thareftir to pay the saide tene merkis yerlie quhile he be put
in ane of the half nethis fischingis forsaide
